“Since my accession to the throne, I have ever been anxious to conquer prejudices and to gain the confidence of my people. I granted toleration, and removed the yoke which had oppressed Protestants for centuries. Tolerance is a convincing proof of the improvement of the human mind.”

The author of the quotation above was most likely a

choices.label: German ruler who had declared for Lutheranism
monarch devoted to the concept of absolutism
Catholic ruler in the time of the Catholic Reformation
